post:
[**IntroVex Solutions Ltd**](https://www.introvex.net) is a web hosting provider incorporated within the United Kingdom (SC517174). We strive to provide reliable solutions at great, affordable prices. Our OpenVZ VPS plans have three available locations: Montreal, Phoenix and Jacksonville; while our KVM VPS plans have two locations: Montreal and Phoenix. The VPS plans we provide are great for people with a wide variety of needs, whether you're a developer looking for somewhere to host your projects, or a business looking to expand.

> TAKE **30% OFF RECURRING ON ANY BILLING TERM**. Valid until 3rd November 2015.
> 
> **Use coupon code:** SPOOKY

**All VPS plans come with FULL ROOT ACCESS and SolusVM VPS Control Panel**

**Halloween Special VPS (OVZ)**

1 CPU Core

128MB RAM

5GB Storage Space

100GB Bandwidth

1 IPv4 Address

DDoS Protection (Montreal and Phoenix only)

**$15 per year recurring - no coupon required!**

[Click here to sign up](https://clients.introvex.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)
